metadata.title: RIZILIA Ocean Heart Pendant with 18" Chain & Heart Cut CZ in White Gold Plated, Simple Modern Elegant
features: [Size and weight]: 25mm(1") x 20mm(0.8"). The chain length is 460mm(18"). Weight is 9gram
[Metal and Gemstones]: Environmentally friendly brass (NICKEL FREE) with 18K White Gold Plated. Simulated Tanzanite are used. Main gemstone size is 10mmx10mmx1

[Designs that transcend time] Reveres the brilliance of viperous markings, alternating materials, and preciousness in each design, with colours most strikingly paired. This Infinity design is simple, modern, elegant.
[Fit all tastes] Jewelry are made for everyday elegant to evening magnificent. The most gorgeous and breathtaking Jewelry, in a range of gemstones and carat, perfect for any special moment.
[Gifting occasions] All Jewelry comes with a Jewelry pouch. Surprise that special someone with a timeless Jewelry treasure they will cherish always.
description: Jewelry is beautifully crafted pieces of remarkable elegance. Designs that transcend time.
